resources.string: Name must be at least 3 characters
For better identification of your mobile phone you may change your name any time in the settings which can be reached via the \'Menu\' button.
Furthermore your preferred application language may be set whereat \'Automatic\' stands for automatic recognition of the global language settings.
The Moment MoWiDi is started you are being redirected to the list holding all re incoming connection requests.

With a simple \'tab\' on any request you will reach the connection dialog where the hashcode of the requester is shown and connection specific settings can be carried out. \'Auto connect\' does all that work for you the next time a respective request comes in (use only on mutual trust).

These can be reached by carrying out a long \'tab\' on a respective connection or request. Additionally you can temporarily set a name for your connection partner (is \'Auto. connect\' checked the name will be stored).
The connection is terminated by tabbing on it, quitting the application or accepting another connection request.
Hint: When the application served its purpose don\'t forget to quit it via the \'Menu\'. By that your mobile phone will stop appearing for the PCs and thus you won\'t be getting requests anymore.
The Development team wishes you a great time with MoWiDi.
